Articles.Content:
Yes, I know Cartoonified isn't a real word...

http://th04.deviantart.net/fs71/PRE/f/2013/250/6/d/kerbal_space_program_the_aeris_4a_wallpaper_by_sickle2596-d6lfrf5.png

You really shouldn't post images that have just been applied a filter to. What would be cool however, is if you either drew/rendered/painted something like this and posted it. Filtered images are a little on the ehh side in originality.

Well, the only thing with a filter would be the background, It's a custom filter I made but the Aeris aircraft I drew. I can see how you think it's a filter. But I ensure you, The Aircraft are drawn by me.
